question.title: com.ibm.ws.jsf.taglib doStartTag Can't leverage base class
question.body:
I'm trying to run a Java 8 JSP project, but I'm encountering errors when attempting to reach a JSP page. Here are the details of the errors:

                                 java.lang.IllegalStateException
    at com.sun.faces.context.FacesContextImpl.assertNotReleased(FacesContextImpl.java:426)
    at com.sun.faces.context.FacesContextImpl.getExternalContext(FacesContextImpl.java:160)
    at com.sun.faces.taglib.jsf_core.SubviewTag.createVerbatimComponentFromBodyContent(SubviewTag.java:100)
    at javax.faces.webapp.UIComponentClassicTagBase.doStartTag(UIComponentClassicTagBase.java:1138)
    at com.sun.faces.taglib.jsf_core.ViewTag.doStartTag(ViewTag.java:193)
    at org.apache.jsp.logon.oldLogin_jsp._jspService(oldLogin_jsp.java:439)
    at org.apache.jasper.runtime.HttpJspBase.service(HttpJspBase.java:70)
    at javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet.service(HttpServlet.java:820)
    at org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServletWrapper.service(JspServletWrapper.java:388)
    at org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServlet.serviceJspFile(JspServlet.java:321)
    at org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServlet.service(JspServlet.java:267)
    at javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet.service(HttpServlet.java:820)
    at org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.ServletHolder.handle(ServletHolder.java:652)
Apr 23, 2025 3:15:15 PM com.sun.faces.taglib.jsf_core.ViewTag doStartTag
WARNING: Can't leverage base class
java.lang.IllegalStateException
    at com.sun.faces.context.FacesContextImpl.assertNotReleased(FacesContextImpl.java:426)
    at com.sun.faces.context.FacesContextImpl.getExternalContext(FacesContextImpl.java:160)
    at com.sun.faces.taglib.jsf_core.SubviewTag.createVerbatimComponentFromBodyContent(SubviewTag.java:100)

If I remove the faceTags library from my JSP, it renders correctly.

All dependencies are installed correctly as well. Others have been able to run the project locally in the same brunch, so I assume it's not a code issue.

Has anyone encountered this issue before? Any suggestions on how to resolve this?

oldLogin.jsp

question_comments.body: Please copy or type the text into the question. Reserve the use of images for diagrams or demonstrating rendering bugs, things that are impossible to describe accurately via text. Code or sample data in images can't be copied and pasted in order to search about a problem or reproduce it. For more details read the Meta FAQ entry Why not upload images of code/errors when asking a question?
